content:
The Daily Grind is a fantastic spot, and I'm sure you'll enjoy it.

As for outdoor seating, I'm happy to report that The Daily Grind does have a small outdoor patio area where you can sit and enjoy your coffee. It's a cozy spot with a few tables and chairs, surrounded by plants and umbrellas to provide some shade. It's the perfect spot to soak up some morning sun and fresh air while you catch up with Alex.

Keep in mind that the outdoor seating area is relatively small, so it's possible that it might be busy on a nice Saturday morning. However, the inside of the cafe is also very comfortable, and you can always grab a table by the window if the patio is full.

One more thing to note is that The Daily Grind is a popular spot, so it's a good idea to arrive fairly early to grab a table, especially if you're planning to sit outside. But I'm sure you'll be able to find a spot to enjoy your coffee and conversation with Alex.

I hope this helps, and I'm sure you'll have a great time at The Daily Grind!
